decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures, removal spells, and disruption tactics to control the board and pressure the opponent. It seeks to quickly build a strong board presence with cards like Deep-Cavern Bat and Faerie Mastermind, while utilizing removal spells like Go for the Throat to deal with opposing threats. The addition of cards like Spyglass Siren and Preacher of the Schism adds disruption to the strategy, allowing the player to further control the game and maintain an aggressive advantage. The inclusion of powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse ensures the deck has a strong late-game presence as well.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures and disruption spells. The key strategy is to apply early pressure with aggressive creatures like The Wandering Emperor and Graveyard Trespasser while using cards like Duress and Go for the Throat to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Wedding Announcement and Virtue of Loyalty provide additional ways to boost your creatures and push through damage. The deck aims to quickly close out the game before the opponent can stabilize or mount a strong defense.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a mixture of powerful creatures like Archangel of Wrath and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, along with spells like Herd Migration and Sunfall. It aims to ramp up mana quickly with cards like Up the Beanstalk and Leyline Binding, while also providing protection with Cavern of Souls and Boseiju, Who Endures. The inclusion of Ill-Timed Explosion and Glimpse the Core offers additional utility and flexibility in dealing with various threats and situations on the battlefield.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and using burn spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early on with creatures like Fugitive Codebreaker and Questing Druid, while also utilizing cards like Monstrous Rage and Twinferno to deal additional damage and clear the opponent's board. By efficiently using its resources and applying consistent pressure, this deck aims to quickly defeat opponents before they can stabilize or mount a strong defense.

The key concept of this Temur Control deck is to utilize a combination of powerful control spells, card draw engines, and big creatures to outvalue and outlast the opponent. By disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal, while also ramping up mana and card advantage, the deck aims to stabilize the board and overwhelm the opponent with large threats like Nissa, Resurgent Animist and Colossal Skyturtle. The inclusion of versatile cards like Memory Deluge and Fires of Victory allows the deck to adapt to various situations and maintain control of the game.
